trans-unit.source: Step 2: Create Partners in the Azure BizTalk Portal
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Create Partners in the Azure BizTalk Portal

trans-unit.source: In this step, you sign in to the <token>tpm_portal</token>, register a service provider, and create partners for <embeddedLabel>Northwind</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Contoso</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In this step, you sign in to the <token>tpm_portal</token>, register a service provider, and create partners for <embeddedLabel>Northwind</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Contoso</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the <token>tpm_portal</token>, as described at <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a Service Provider on the BizTalk Services Portal</link>.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the <token>tpm_portal</token>, as described at <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a Service Provider on the BizTalk Services Portal</link>.

trans-unit.source: Add two partners, <embeddedLabel>Northwind</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Contoso</embeddedLabel>, following the steps at <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.
trans-unit.target: Add two partners, <embeddedLabel>Northwind</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>Contoso</embeddedLabel>, following the steps at <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.
